com.buabook.common.net

Class DataSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buabook.common.net.DataSocket

  • public class DataSocket
extends Object

    Simple Socket Wrapper

    This class is a simple Socket wrapper that exposes the native Socket.getInputStream() and Socket.getOutputStream() as a DataInputStream and DataOutputStream respectively.

    This is useful when wanting to send data over a socket at a low-level (i.e. serialising / de-serialising Google Protobuf messages).

    (c) 2014 - 2017 Sport Trades Ltd
    Since:
    14 Jul 2014
    Version:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Jas Rajasansir

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSocket

        public DataSocket(Socket socket)
           throws DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException
        Instantiates the wrapper object based on an existing Socket
        Throws:
        DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException - If the socket provided is null or if there is any error when attempting to create the DataInputStream or DataOutputStream.
        See Also:
        initialiseIOStreams()

      • isClosed

        public Boolean isClosed()
        Returns:
        true if the socket has been closed. This will only occur when the disconnect() method is called (which in turn should be called when an IOException occurs on one of the data streams). Unfortunately the state change of the socket isn't accurately reflected in the Socket object.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects the socket. Any error that occurs during disconnect is suppressed.

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect()
               throws DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException
        This method will only attempt a reconnect on a disconnected socket (i.e. isClosed() returns true). The socket that is created has the following properties set:
        • Socket.setKeepAlive(boolean) = true
        Throws:
        DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException - If the socket cannot be connected
        See Also:
        isClosed(), initialiseIOStreams()

      • initialiseIOStreams

        private void initialiseIOStreams()
                          throws DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException
        Throws:
        DataSocketFailedToInitialiseException
